lead_paragraph: Most of the dead were civilians in a confrontation after the ambush of a police convoy in an area known for drug gangs bordering Michoacán and Jalisco States.

headline.print_headline: Gun Battle in Mexico Kills Dozens
headline.main: 40 Are Killed in Gun Battle in Mexico

snippet: Most of the dead were civilians in a confrontation after the ambush of a police convoy in an area known for drug gangs bordering Michoacán and Jalisco States.
abstract: Mexican authorities say over 40 people died after federal police convoy was ambushed in southwestern part of country where Jalisco New Generation, powerful drug gang, has been ascendant.
